entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups() returns null group objects #80675
  • [API Proposal]: Add ADCX and ADOX intrinsics #80674
  • The type initializer for 'System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser' threw an exception #80672
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror failure #80666
  • [API Proposal]: Expand Complex Number support #80665
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for Int256 and UInt256 data types #80663

Closed

  • Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #24601
    Future
  • builder.Services.Configure bind configuration multiple times #80669

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix fuzzers for .NET 8 SDK publish #80673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add statically linked libnuma support for AOT #80671
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Reduce collisions in mono_aot_method_hash () for some wra… #80667
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Normalize RepoRoot path to improve logs readability #80664
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update our inline observations to special case a few more intrinsics #80637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Be more conservative with peephole optimization #80645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use ROS<long> in FormattingHelpers instead of ROS<byte> #80668
  • Remove duplicate function #80643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle float/double for RVA[cns] optimization in fgValueNumberConstLoad #80661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Quote illink substitutions path #80657
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ability statically link OpenSSL #80380
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some low-hanging HWIntrinsic issues #80626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid emitting the eh info table, its not used on wasm. #80653
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid using a null heap to decommit the mark array #80640
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix implicit byref block expansion #80659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80642
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] debugger tests- Misc improvements #80660
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger]Disable test which is getting stuck #80658
    area-Debugger-mono
